sourcesContent: import t from"react";import r from"../utils/with-defaults";import a from"./row.styles";import{jsx as s}from"react/jsx-runtime";const e=({children:t,gap:r,justify:e,align:i,wrap:l,css:o,...c})=>s(a,{css:{flexWrap:l,$$rowGap:`calc(${r} * $space$lg)`,marginLeft:`calc(${r} * $space$lg / 2)`,marginRight:`calc(${r} * $space$lg / 2)`,justifyContent:e,alignItems:i,...o},...c,children:t});e.toString=()=>".nextui-row";const i=t.memo(e);export default r(i,{gap:0,wrap:"nowrap",justify:"flex-start",align:"flex-start"});
